unmatched_baselines.Baseline Requirement: jpt aims to help vendors gauge the performance impact of their apps, so they can test and refine it for our mutual customers. we're working on improving infrastructure provisioning, shipping enterprise-scale data sets, and providing reference traffic profiles. in its current state, you can use jpt to compare jira's performance with and without an app

we want jpt to help customers test hypotheses that answer crucial questions like "how can our hardware handle an extra 12% increase in issues" or "how much would archiving 100 projects help".  to do this, jpt creates virtual users to access and use your instance, noting the response time to common user actions. jpt is also designed to operate behind your firewall, so you won't have to expose or anonymize your data

this task is to implement the initial version of the duracloud 3.0 service architecture, as discussed here: https://wiki.duraspace.org/display/dspint/duracloud+3.0+service+strategy. the goal of this architecture is to replace the existing (duracloud 2.x) service infrastructure with a system that can more efficiently and more reliably manage actions over large content sets."

"especially on linux, the automatic display of the sync tool setup/admin screen is not reliably displayed in a browser.  also, when is does display if there are many browser windows open it is hard to find.  it would be helpful to display the url as a message when the sync tools is started from the command line.  it would also be helpful to display the url as part the tray icon in some fashion."

this task is to provide users with useful feedback when they attempt any of these actions on a content item in glacier.   more specifically, when a call is made on a glacier content item via the storeclient, a contentstateexception is thrown. (if the content item was recently added or has been retrieved from glacier, it will simply download as expected) this task is to show the user an appropriate error message indicating that the content is in glacier. for now, that error message can indicate that the user should contact duracloud support if they wish to retrieve that content item."
"ui: handle glacier storage state errors gracefully"
ensure that it can be easily installed, it functions properly, and that there are no usability issues

"durastore: skip sending event messages for content in administrative spaces"

the sync tool to preserve the local timestamp information for individual files (both the creation and modified dates/times). they would like this information passed into duracloud via the sync tool, available for viewing within duradmin, and then retrieved/restored properly by the retrieval tool when content is downloaded."
